thread.title: Judge finalizes actor Gary Oldman's divorce from 4th wife
thread.title_full: Judge finalizes actor Gary Oldman's divorce from 4th wife

title: Judge finalizes actor Gary Oldman's divorce from 4th wife
text: > Entertainment Judge finalizes actor Gary Oldman's divorce from 4th wife FILE - In this Feb. 26, 2012 file photo, Gary Oldman, right, and Alexandra Edenborough arrive before the 84th Academy Awards in the Hollywood section of Los Angeles. A Los Angeles judge finalized Oldmanâ€™s divorce from his fourth wife, singer Edenborough, on Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015, court records show. The Oscar-nominated actor will pay Edenborough $3.3 million as part of their judgment, which ends a six-year marriage. (AP Photo/Chris Pizzello, File)
